mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.spec_id AS "productSpec.id", a.position_id AS "position.id", b.name as "position.name", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.img_nail_url AS "imgNailUrl", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
